TopicTitle: Just another hole in the wall

Articles.Content:
![gfzq6Cl.png](http://i.imgur.com/gfzq6Cl.png)

I have been able to launch vessels from this spot many times. But this time the vessel was not launched from inside the SPH instead of by clicking on the runway. That caused the game to lock up and the craft to become stuck in the wall. 

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/QvHBV)

I've only had that happen once to me when I had a huge rocket in the VAB which stopped me from building. I couldn't get rid of it, so I started a new savegame ![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif).

Good luck trying to get rid of that thing ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

What are those weird, ugly panels on the wall?

Never seen that before. Is this the lower-tier SPH?

I saw the TT18 clamp as a droid carrying more metal pieces in its fuel-ducts-arms to fix the wall.

Anyone else ? Maybe the guy who sees submachine-gun-shaped ships ?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-09T14:38:17Z" title="08/09/2015 02:38  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 9, 2015</time> by Plume & Akakak**

> 
> What are those weird, ugly panels on the wall?
> Never seen that before. Is this the lower-tier SPH?

you might want [this](https://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/3a1a09/goodbye_plate_download_link_in_the_description/)
Why would one try to launch from inside a building in the first place?
